entry.title: The Most Over Valued Metaverse I've Ever Seen - Decentraland

media:group.media:title: The Most Over Valued Metaverse I've Ever Seen - Decentraland
media:group.media:description:
"The Metaverse" has become a viral term. Facebook has rebranded to Meta, massive valuations for small, unproven projects claiming to build "The Oasis" from Ready Player One... this new viral trend has it all.
However, with all the hype, comes disaster. Giant valuations for projects that cannot justify the number... runaway dev teams who steal user funds, and a new frontier of reskinned, rebranded and sub par "games" that are at best a pale imitation of what came before, for a much higher price tag.
Enter: "Decentraland"

media:group.media:title: Amazons Horrifying Side Effect
media:group.media:description:
Amazon is a global retail platform with unimaginable utility. However... a side effect of their self governing recommendation algorithm... is that darker patterns of monetization can start to emerge.
Recommending and fulfilling a depression based goal of self harm, by combining and pushing the tools to fulfill those impulses is one of the most demented aspects of product promotion I have ever seen in my life. It remains to be seen how a current lawsuit will unfold, but it is rooted in a concept of unchecked and sometimes damaging machine learning.
Crisis Help Resources.
Global Helpline Numbers: https://blog.opencounseling.com/suicide-hotlines/
Prevention foundation: https://afsp.org/
Resource Center: https://www.sprc.org/

entry.title: Absolute GARBAGE - The Rings of Power

media:group.media:title: Absolute GARBAGE - The Rings of Power
media:group.media:description:
Having now seen another 4 episodes (6 in total)... I find myself hating Lord of the Rings "The Rings of Power" more than almost any other piece of cinema I have ever watched. It is horrible in every sense of the world. Writing, pacing, directing, tension, lore, and accuracy are nothing more than a shallow joke with a total disregard for practically anything that would even remotely make sense.
How and why this has happened escapes me. With every episode costing as much money as full feature films... the series succeeds in one thing, and one thing alone. Disrespecting the legacy and work of Tolkien.

media:group.media:title: The Cheating Scandal Tearing Chess Apart - Magnus Carlsen and Hans Niemann
media:group.media:description:
Chess is the worlds most popular sport, by far. Regardless of how you classify it (sport, or game) it has a community of over 600 million people. Today, we discuss a scandal that has rocked the professional chess community, and created a deep divide over allegations of cheating at the highest level of competition.
Magnus Carlson and Hans Niemann face off as the world champion asserts that this 19 year old chess prodigy, may in fact be a deceptive cheat.

Sign up for a 14-day free trial explore your family history deeper than ever and enjoy all the amazing features MyHeritage has to offer. If you decide to continue your subscription, you'll get a 50% discount. https://bit.ly/UpperEchelonGamers
MMM Global (a resurgence of the original MMM Ponzi Scheme) is one of the largest scam networks in human history. Conceptualized for one key purpose (the destruction of modern finance) it has persisted for over a decade, inside over 100 different nations.
Built by a pseudo financial cult leader named Sergei Mavrodi, this global Ponzi scheme directly targets developing nations in order to bring about a "financial apocalypse"... and today, id like to talk about it.
